verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump ’s push for tariffs on imported cars and trucks] [V: threatened] [ARG1: a shake - up of the global auto industry] [ARGM-ADV: while motivating nations including China and Germany to reiterate commitments of varying strength to free trade] .
